name: Nine IT consulting
tag_list: website-development, iphone-application, ios, iphone, android, software-development, application, ui-design, design, moodle, joomla, drupal
overview: Hello Search Communications is a group of self motivated techno-creative brains. After servicing full fledge business houses we have gathered the versatile experience to build the software excellence. The solutions will be custom to each and every business needs because we believe each business is unique that requires unique ideas. Our solutions will work inline with customer business logic and will make thought process easier for them. Search Communications runs on a philosophy of “Grow along with Customer”. So we work closely to clients like they are our partners and consider ourselves accountable for their profit. Our business concepts vary on customer requirements. We present small business as a business house with their online presence on web. Our Ecommerce Solutions are designed to give a kick start to the customer’s online web business. We provide newer and bigger market to the customer with our ecommerce solutions. Our Multimedia Solutions breathe life to customer company and product presentations. The visual presentation of processes and work flow helps customer to tape the serious business market. Our Software Solutions are addressing customer’s onsite and offsite custom business logic and reporting needs. Our Search Engine Optimization services are based on one concept which is “bottom line”. We bring your website ahead of your competitor on major search engines. Data transaction services provided by us are built to make sure you never miss a chunk of data smaller or bigger. Content Management System of Search Communications would help you out to manage your website content. A content management system (CMS) is a system used to manage the content of a Web site in which we maintains every aspect of your website content for you. We can create custom web content management systems. All the solutions provided by us come with Free Consultation Services so you never fall behind on return on investment. Technologies: a. Microsoft Technologies: .net technologies, AJAX, Anthem.Net b. Open Source: PHP, Joomla, Drupal, Magento, Wordpress etc. c. Mobile Application development (iphone, android, blackberry, windows as well as table development) d. Database: My SQL, MS SQL etc. e. Designing: Macromedia, Adobe, Web 2.0, W3C Standard-HTML/XHTML, CSS,HTML,XHTML, Corel Draw, Fireworks , Multimedia Solutions, Table less Layout / Div Based, Action Script. f. SEO Services: SEO (Search Engine Optimization), OnPage optimization, OffPage optimization, SEM (Search engine marketing), PPC (Pay per click), Link building, Site Report generation, Content Optimization, Quality Link Generation, Internet marketing Display advertising, E-mail marketing, E-mail marketing software, Interactive advertising, Social media optimization, Web analytics, Google analytics f. Domain Knowledge: E-commerce, Job Sites, Social Networking, Community websites, SEO, Auction, CMS solution etc. Looking forward to your response Thanks Regards Aarat Patel
